prompt: <description>Part 1: Rectangular Prism with a Curved Side Construct a rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a curved side. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the following parameters: * Euler Angles: -90.0, 0.0, -90.0 * Translation Vector: 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 Sketch the first face of the prism by drawing a hexagon with the following loops and lines: * Line 1: Start Point (0.0, 0.0), End Point (0.0938, 0.0) * Line 2: Start Point (0.0938, 0.0), End Point (0.0938, 0.0112) * Line 3: Start Point (0.0938, 0.0112), End Point (0.0112, 0.0112) * Line 4: Start Point (0.0112, 0.0112), End Point (0.0112, 0.0938) * Line 5: Start Point (0.0112, 0.0938), End Point (0.0, 0.0938) * Line 6: Start Point (0.0, 0.0938), End Point (0.0, 0.0) Note that each line has two curves. Scale the sketch using a scaling parameter of 0.0938. Transform the scaled 2D sketch into a 3D sketch with the following parameters: * Euler Angles: -90.0, 0.0, -90.0 * Translation Vector: 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 Extrude the sketch by 0.75 units towards the normal direction. This will create a solid rectangular prism. Part 2: Cylindrical Object with Flat Top and Bottom Construct a cylindrical object with flat top and bottom, connected by a cylindrical tube. Begin by creating a new coordinate system with the following parameters: * Euler Angles: 180.0, 0.0, -90.0 * Translation Vector: 0.5738, 0.0112, 0.0365 Sketch the first face by drawing a circle with the following parameters: * Center: (0.0113, 0.0127) * Radius: 0.0112 Sketch the second face by drawing a circle with the following parameters: * Center: (0.4954, 0.0112) * Radius: 0.0112 Scale the sketch using a scaling parameter of 0.5066. Cut the sketch with the following parameters: * Extrude depth towards normal: 0.0 * Extrude depth opposite normal: 0.0938 This will create a solid cylindrical object with a flat top and bottom, connected by a cylindrical tube. Overall dimensions: * Final shape: A rectangular prism with a flat top and bottom, and a sloped side. * Part 1: Length 0.75, width 0.0938, height 0.0938 * Part 2: Length 0.5066, width 0.0938, height 0.5066</description>
